item.title: My projects
item.description: I am a developer for embedded systems. I work on hardware as well as on low-level software. My current projects (apart from my one-year old son): SDuino: Adopting the Arduino environment for the STM8 MCU building a Shapeoko CNC mill UV exposure unit for PCB prototyping (etching mask and solder mask) reflow oven: Control electronics and software SMT pick and place machine: Develop and build, using DC motors from inkjet printers Available tools:

item.title: Binaries for plotkicadsch
